title: Instagram
description:
Bringing you closer to the people and things you love. ‚Äî Instagram from Facebook

Connect with friends, share what you‚Äôre up to, or see what's new from others all over the world. Explore our community where you can feel free to be yourself and share everything from your daily moments to life's highlights.

Express Yourself and Connect With Friends

* Add photos and videos to your story that disappear after 24 hours, and bring them to life with fun creative tools.
* Message your friends in Direct. Start fun conversations about what you see on Feed and Stories.
* Post photos and videos to your feed that you want to show on your profile.

Learn More About Your Interests

* Check out IGTV for longer videos from your favorite creators.
* Get inspired by photos and videos from new accounts in Explore.
* Discover brands and small businesses, and shop products that are relevant to your personal style.

* Post photos and videos to your feed that you want to show on your profile.

* Discover brands and small businesses, and shop products that are relevant to your personal style.
summary: Bringing you closer to the people and things you love.
comments: I LOVE Instagram but since i got my new phone I can't use the thread camera for videos!! I've reported the problem many times and nothing happened!! I don't know whether it's a bug or a glitch i don't really understand this stuff but, whenever i record a video it only saves the first one it doesn't save the rest of the thread!!! It keeps telling me ERROR!

Not everytime but every few weeks, whenever I press the app, it will power my phone completely off. I have to restert my phone and delete the app, then reinstall it and log back into my account. Its not a massive problem but its still really annoying and inconvenient. Its happened more then 5 times. Also, when I want to send a picture, not all of them will show, it will appear grey and it doesn't load. All the pics work fine on every other platform except instagram

The app is good. The only concerns I have are 1) some of the app features aren't available in my country 2) the app sometimes crashes on anroid and 3) the new dark mode app is well but I think it would be much better if the text weren't so gray that makes it harder to read because of its nearness of shade with the background. I hope the developers or the response team reads this and addresses these concerns.

Instagram was great when I first installed it. I could look at the amazing pictures of my friends. Now I hate it. "Action Blocked" keeps occurring which prevents from following, unfollowing, and hearting my friend's pictures. This is ridiculous! I really wish Instagram will fix my problem. Then maybe I might write a 5 star review because it overall was a great app until this happened.

For some reason, some thumbnails are awfully blurry and there's nothing you can do about it. UPD: so sad that I can't remove the last star. After the recent update, stories started disappering out of the blue, sometimes my newsfeed gets totally empty. Also, I see no point in returning the horrendous old style emoji. Very poor job, Facebook.

comments: I love this app, it works great. I'm not going to dock it down a star because I like it so much, but everytime I try to log into instagram from the app it keeps telling me my password is wrong. I will try and log in over and over but I always get the message that my password is wrong. Other than that, it works exactly as advertised. Great app!

This is by far the best saver ever!! I've never been able to download things so easily! Especially since I cannot screenshot, I adore this app! I just seem to be missing something with the saver, it takes abit long to save, so that's just something to improve. Keep up the good work! üíï

This app is ideal for people who want to rip other people's pics without giving credit. Not so great for people who respect other's work and like to tag up shared pics. Also almost impossible to use without triggering pop-up adds. Used for 3 days, got progressively more and more annoyed.

i think i used a lot of apps before this but this one is the one i sticked for a long time, mybe a year or so. there's not a lot of ads that's gonna bother you, and bery simple steps! copy and paste then it will download! very simple! thumbs upp!!

GREAT experience overall, I love the quick downloads regardless of the quality.... I just wish it would download multiple links when I open the app instead of just the last copied one.... However, I'm very satisfied with the current version. Hope to see more like this with your other apps :)

title: Instasize: Photo Editor + Collage
description:
Instasize is the photo and video toolkit for social content creators. Download today and experience premium filters, borders, and adjustments to create scroll stopping content.

Edit images on the go transforming them from unedited pics to Instagram ready posts in seconds. The days of switching back and forth between multiple apps to achieve one final edit are DONE. More editing tools in one place means quicker editing, leaving YOU more time to focus on -> your next photo upload, engaging with followers, and building your presence! 

You don‚Äôt need to be a big time influencer to create big time edits, anyone at any skill level can add a personal + professional touch to the photos they post online.

NATURALLY ENHANCING FILTERS FOR PICTURES:
With over 80 photographer inspired filters, you‚Äôre bound to find a filter that fits the aesthetic you‚Äôre looking for. Bring a crisp HD look to any photo, regardless of what you used to shoot it. Maintain a cohesive feel across ALL of you social platforms. Exclusive filters released monthly to all premium members. 

EDITING ADJUSTMENTS:
Custom editing made easy - adjust sharpness, brightness, exposure, contrast, and much more. If you‚Äôre looking to finely adjust details within your photos, we can help you do that. 

COLLAGE MAKER: 
Instantly combine multiple photos into one with our easy to use collage maker. Choose from a plethora of photo layouts, move images around, add patterned backgrounds, text, etc. - your creative potential is endless. Truly make memories come to life by creating one of a kind collages for friends and family. 

PRO FONTS & TEXT EDITOR: 
Add text to your photos, choose from over 30 unique fonts. Our text editor is easy to manipulate, will allow you to choose from a plethora of colors and sizes, and will help you add a personal, yet professional, touch. Exclusive fonts available for premium subscribers.

BORDERS:
Instantly resize images to fit perfectly on Instagram. Keep the traditional white Instasize border, or use one of our 25+ themed border packs to add a personal touch to any social media post. Choose from fun patterns like GLITTER, MARBLE, HOLIDAYS, and COLORS

RESIZE + FREE CROP:
Instantly resize your image to fit on any social platform. 

INSTASIZE PREMIUM:
Unlock your creative potential with Instasize Premium. An upgrade to Instasize premium will instantly unlock exclusive filters, fonts, and editing tools that are updated MONTHLY. Yes you read that correctly, we give you new features monthly when you‚Äôre a premium subscriber. Experience the best photo editing tools that have been made specifically for content creators. 

GET FEATURED:
If you‚Äôre using Instasize to edit your content, we want to feature you! Follow and tag us on Instagram for an opportunity for more exposure: @instasize.official

Terms of use:
http://instasize.com/terms

Privacy Policy:
http://instasize.com/privacy

comments: I have installed this app on an android phone and it won't let me drag the images around the grid to rearrange. Have you gotten rid of this feature? If so, please bring it back as it was one of the best things about the app! Being able to easily play with the order of your posts was really helpful! Help!

I'm honestly just really disappointed. This version of the app barely functions, and has less than half the features of its iOS counterpart. What gives?? I highly recommend the iOS version, but I wouldn't even give the android version a try unless you just want to be frustrated and feel shorted on features.
It a great app, as with any electronic software the developer's will improve and make better where ever those area's are at.
Good filters, easy to use, works well.
Really good filters and useful for getting a white border!

title: IGTV
description:
IGTV now supports landscape video in addition to vertical.

Watch long-form, video from your favorite Instagram creators. 

IGTV is different from your typical video experience. It‚Äôs built for how you actually use your phone and not limited to one minute, which means you can see more of your favorite content.

FEATURES

* Download and sign in with your Instagram account. You can start watching videos right away. 
* Watch videos from creators you already follow and others you might like. 
* Browse other videos or search for a specific creator‚Äôs channel as you watch.
* Like or comment on videos and send them to your friends in Direct.

comments: Utterly useless. I try to login, it says "We detected an unusual login attempt", then asks to choose an option to confirm...and then has no means to say "OK" to confirm, so you're locked in that screen. Really? Seriously, is that they best you can do?
Unusual login detected when attempting to login for the first time. I was supposed to recieve an e-mail with a code to prove it was me but I never recieved it Useless and a waste of time.
Hell lot of improvement has to be done. It been like a test of patience in uploading a video. Why the hell it always show there is a weak network connectivity?
The upload speed is so slow. I was uploading a 3 minute video, and I was waiting for more than an hour. I gave up. Uninstalling. :(
I used it once, and then it keeps saying..'we'll upload when you have a steady network' but every other thing works, my network is fine. Please fix.

title: Layout from Instagram: Collage
description:
Instagram's newest app is a better way to make collages. Layout lets you create one-of-a-kind layouts by remixing your own photos and sharing them with your friends.

Choose photos from your gallery‚Äîor use the built-in Photo Booth to snap spur-of-the-moment shots‚Äîand instantly see them laid out in a cool collage. Pick the layout you like best, then edit it to make it your own.

Layout's smooth, intuitive process gives you complete creative control. Tap to mirror, flip or replace images, hold and drag to swap them, pinch to zoom in or out, or pull the handles to resize. You're the editor, so get creative with the way you stitch things together‚Äîyou can tell a story, show off an outfit or just splice, dice and change the look of your regular photos to convey a mood or theme.


**FEATURES**

* Re-mix up to 9 of your photos at a time to create fun, personalized layouts and collages.
* Use the Faces tab to quickly find photos with people in them.
* Capture the moment in Photo Booth mode with quick, spontaneous shots.
* Save your layouts to your gallery and share them seamlessly to Instagram or other networks.
* Easily see the last 30 photos you've selected in the Recents tab.
* Pair your layouts and collages with Instagram's filters and creative tools afterwards to make them stand out even more.
* Download and start creating a layout or collage immediately. No signup or account required‚Äîand no clutter breaking up your flow.

comments: For the most part, it's a nice app. My biggest problem comes with trying to get the desired photos for a certain project when they aren't the latest ones I've used. I also have issues with moving photos within the screen and resizing them within the parameters of the section. It may simply be user error, but I'd think that having a "help" option would make it easier to figure out how to do certain things.

Fantastic experience I have been using it for 3 years now. With my iPhone and my Samsung Galaxy phone so I love it. One of my favorite apps. It makes the creative process easy and you can do a lot with your photos with your family, friends, business, or hobbies. Layout is great for collages, calendars, flyers, and websites.

It reads like you can take photos ONLY being used in your IG 'gallery'. Which would allow you to make a 'personalized top 9'. However, that's not the case. It brings you to your phone's gallery, where all of your photos are at. Too hard to find posts from last year...

I love the collage-making capabilities in this app. I use it a lot. It could get better with more options though, like for rotating a pic, editing a pic right there, adding filters, etc. Nonetheless, a really good app.

Really useful! But lacks some important things like a multiple photo share option for Androids. You have to go into the app to find photos, which depending on your post can mean searching through 1000s of photos instead of being able to share a couple from an album.

comments: I see my original review of this useless app has been removed, tried it again tonight and it doesn't work at all now. If you remove this review, I will continue to write new ones as I paid for the upgrade. All I got was getting timed out after 15-30 seconds and no information available. So Google DO NOT remove my review as I paid good money for what I thought would be a decent product and if you remove this I will cancel my Youtube subscription.

Upgrading to the Pro version is a complete waste of money. I kept getting a "NoSuchMethodError" Exception when trying to switch between the tabs and the loading of Top Likers, Top Commenters and Ghost Followers gets stuck at 1%, 35% and 1% respectively before timing out and giving me an error that I have to try again later. I have followed all the instructions mentioned in the FAQ but in vain. I was was not able to use any of the features that I have paid for. I contacted the support and they were not helpful at all, I was just asked to request a refund from Google Play, when I did I got an email that Google Play can NOT provide a refund for this purchase because it doesn't meet with their policy.

Sometimes it works properly but sometimes it does not. For ex. If there are 100 followers, someone new followed me, and then after sometime if i refresh it, it just shows all of the followers into newly followed. This is not a proper way to keep a track of people following us. Even it does not properly show who unfollowed you if there is decrease in the number of followers.

Scam. Upgraded to pro, there was no difference in speed and most importantly none of the pro functions works. NOTHING. I contacted the app developer and they said they were fixing bugs and a new update was coming out soon. I waited for 3 weeks and still nothing. I contacted them again for refund, and they said they don't provide refund and for me to contact Google play. But Google doesn't refund after 2 days. Everything was a waste of money and time. So don't bother buying the Pro stick with the free version, there's no difference. I would rate the free version 5 stars though.

App is beyond buggy! Sometimes after it scans it says that all your followers have stopped following you, and that you've unfollowed everyone! Brutal. They also used to have a grading system within the app for your IG profile, they removed it. Way too inconsistent in how it works. Look for better alternatives, save yourself the frustration I've experienced. App is garbage.

comments: Used to be my favourite app for adding backgrounds to images and making them square, but recently every single picture I've put through this app has been mysteriously deleted, more than once. Not only is it suuuuuper annoying but also quite alarming and suspicious, it really should not be doing that and makes me think of what other stuff they're accessing and tamping with. Will not be using this app again. Severely disappointed.

It deletes your downloaded photos! It isnt the most user friendly app but it works. I spent a half hour cropping a ton of photos one at a time to upload to insta later. (It takes forever) The next day they were erased from my phone! I thought I accidentally deleted them. So I spent another 45 minutes redoing everything and yup the next day they were gone! No warning in the app about this. Ridiculous, those were downloaded files, an app should not be capable of doing that in the first place.

If you dont rate the app, everytime you eddit a picture you have to select 'remind me later' that is annoying and not worthy of 5 stars. Plus if you select the wrong picture you have to back all the main screen just to select a different picture. Here's the rating for the pestering rate prompt that interupts my app activity every single time use it. Hopefully it will stop now that you have your rate.

I use to enjoy using this app, using it for about 3 years now and since of late I cannot get to edit my pics. The moment I select my pic, the app crash. Been experiencing this for about 4 months and I had no choice but to uninstall it.

Great app!! Perfect for image editing in general (like if you need to resize an image) for example - if your image doesn't fit properly when changing a display/profile picture or on the screen when changing/setting a wallpaper on your device, I'd recommend this app as your 'go to' 100%! It's worked üëåüëåüëåfor me everytime!

comments: I used this app on my S9+ and it worked flawlessly. I switched to a Galaxy S20 Ultra and now I get the message that it was built for a different version of Android OS. Now I have to switch from IG after clicking "Copy Link" to Fast Save app and turn off FastSave Service and turn it back on for the picture/video to download. Please fix for One UI 2.1 / Android 10 and I will gladly give this 5 stars again. This app is by far the best IG downloader when it works correctly.

Huhu. I gave you 5 stars because this app is the best for me, so far. You don't necessarily have to go back to the app to download the posts. It automatically saves them just by copying the URL. But lately, I am unable to use it as my phone requires updating the app's version. I'm seriously hoping you'd hear me out and be able to make this work on a Samsung Galaxy Note 9. I'll definitely re-install this app.

It was great at first. I'd even go as far as to say it was/is amazing. The only problem is that you have to to open this app then go straight to instagram through this app otherwise the downloaded pictures/videos wont show up in your gallery. Now my biggest problem is that, once I turn it on and use it to go to IG, my IG freezes instantly...like my IG will be fine until I decide that I want to start downloading things and as soon as i turn it on and go to IG with it then thats it for my IG.,

Edit - since the latest Android update, FastSave advises it may not work on this latest version and to contact the developer. I've noticed that I have to repeatedly go out of FsstSave, end the app, close out of Instagram as when you select copy link, nothing appears in FsstSave unless you do the above, each time! Will there be an update to this app to accommodate the latest Android update?

At the beginning when I downloaded the app, my downloads saved in my gallery immediately and so easy. Now nothing I choose saves in my gallery, not even under the app in saved video or pics. I even uninstalled the app and downloaded it again but still the same. When I copy and share it send a link via social media but nothing saves so I am disappointed with regards to that, not sure what changed!

title: Preview - Plan your Instagram
description:
EVERYTHING you need in ONE app.

FREE UNLIMITED posts, rearrange posts, edit, schedule, hashtag manager, analytics, repost & more.

‚Ä¢ DRAG & DROP

‚Ä¢ UNLIMITED grid space

‚Ä¢ ANALYTICS & INSIGHTS

‚Ä¢ AMAZING FILTERS

‚Ä¢ REPOST photos, videos & albums

‚Ä¢ PLAN & DESIGN

‚Ä¢ SCHEDULE

‚Ä¢ CAPTION

‚Ä¢ HASHTAG FINDER & ANALYTICS

‚Ä¢ HASHTAGS groups, recent & most used

‚Ä¢ EDITING TOOLS whitening tool, blemish remover, stickers, memes maker & more

‚Ä¢ TEAM feature & permissions

‚Ä¢ DESKTOP APP at https://preview.app

‚Ä¢ MULTI DEVICE

‚Ä¢ BACKUP

‚Ä¢ NO LOGIN required (unless you want to)

‚Ä¢ NO INTERNET required


Instagram like a PRO. Preview is your visual planner for Instagram. Predict what your feed will look like before you post anything on Instagram. It has all the features you need in one app. No more switching between multiple apps.


DRAG & DROP
Use the drag & drop to arrange your Instagram photos & videos. Design your own unique theme. Color coordinate. Predict how your feed will look like. Or simply plan your content in advance.


ANALYTICS & INSIGHTS
Track your performance, see best times to post & best hashtags. Optimize your account to get the most out of it.


AMAZING FILTERS
Design your own unique and amazing feed that reflects your personality or brand. Preview comes with 12 beautiful filter packs and 73 unique filters.
Choose a theme pack: tropical, grunge, white, colorful, pastel & more.


REPOST
Share other Instagrammers‚Äô photos and videos. Save them in Preview for later. Curate your feed.


PERFECT YOUR CAPTIONS
Write your captions in advance and perfect them. Use the hashtag suggestion tool. Save your hashtag groups within the app and add them to new posts at a press of a button.


HASHTAG FINDER
Search for the best Instagram hashtags to grow your account. Search by category, country, city & Instagram community.


SCHEDULE
Set a day and time for your post. See what you have scheduled for the day, week and month. When it‚Äôs time to post, Preview will send you a notification. All you have to do is send your post to Instagram and paste your caption.


AMAZING EDITING TOOLS
All the basics are in Preview: contrast, saturation, exposure, etc...
And your favorites too: free whitening tool, blemish remover, stickers, meme maker & much more.


UNLIMITED GRID SPACE (for free)
Add as many photos and videos you want in your Preview gallery. Your creativity doesn‚Äôt have a limit!


MANAGE UNLIMITED ACCOUNTS
Manage as many Instagram accounts as you want and easily switch between them. A plan is required per Instagram account.


PLAN YOUR FEED WITH YOUR TEAM
Give access to your Preview feed to your team by sharing (or not sharing) your Instagram password.


NO LOGIN OR INTERNET REQUIRED
You don‚Äôt need to login or have internet to use Preview.


LOAD YOUR RECENT INSTAGRAM POSTS
Want to make your Preview feed flow with your current theme? No problem. Simply login to Instagram.


Have fun creating!

The Preview Team
@preview.app

Search for the best Instagram hashtags to grow your account. Search by category, country, city & Instagram community.


SCHEDULE
Set a day and time for your post. See what you have scheduled for the day, week and month. When it‚Äôs time to post, Preview will send you a notification. All you have to do is send your post to Instagram and paste your caption.


AMAZING EDITING TOOLS
All the basics are in Preview: contrast, saturation, exposure, etc...
And your favorites too: free whitening tool, blemish remover, stickers, meme maker & much more.


UNLIMITED GRID SPACE (for free)
Add as many photos and videos you want in your Preview gallery. Your creativity doesn‚Äôt have a limit!


MANAGE UNLIMITED ACCOUNTS
Manage as many Instagram accounts as you want and easily switch between them. A plan is required per Instagram account.


PLAN YOUR FEED WITH YOUR TEAM
Give access to your Preview feed to your team by sharing (or not sharing) your Instagram password.


NO LOGIN OR INTERNET REQUIRED
You don‚Äôt need to login or have internet to use Preview.


LOAD YOUR RECENT INSTAGRAM POSTS
Want to make your Preview feed flow with your current theme? No problem. Simply login to Instagram.


Have fun creating!

The Preview Team
@preview.app
summary: ALL-IN-ONE Instagram tool: Presets, themes, plan, analytics, schedule & repost.

comments: I am not able to upload my post to my Instagram through preview it just started today. I have logged out logged back in, restarted my phone, and still the same error message I can do everything else except upload to my Instagram. I would love to be helped with this issue so I don't have to delete this awesome app and learn how to use another one. Thank you!

I am having trouble logging into my preview account. Which prevents me from saving the photos i have uploaded into the APP. I need to save these photos separately now that i dont want to continue with my premium account! Please correct this soon!!! Update: 2 days later my issues still not resolved even with emaol support! This is getting frustrated and i regret uploading all my photos on to this app üò°

Hi! I created a Preview account for paid for a Premium one. It was alright for about 3weeks. Then I got logged out on the app and when I tried to log back in it says an acvount doesn't exist. What's worse is thats I still got debited today. What is going on??? Please help me out.  Thank you.  I love this app please don't ruin the experience for me.

After setting up all things, it took all my Facebook login info but I am still unable to login due to the error "an error occur while logging in - try again". Sometimes I get success to bypass this error but still unable to get sign in. I am dragged to a page that ask me to choose my FB page and when I choose that, it goes back to previous app page and ask again to login. I think I will spend my remaining life at these 2 steps now.

I'm a fledgling business & use the free version. It is really easy to use & enough features for me at the moment. The free photos and hash tag generator are great. I use the app for both Instagram & Pinterest. If I was a larger business I'd upgrade. It's really good that companies like this offer free versions for emerging business who are cash strapped. Thank you.

title: PhotoSplit - Photo Grid Maker for Instagram
description:
PhotoSplit is the fastest growing app to split your photos to grid and post them directly to Instagram.

PhotoSplit lets you divide any picture into a 3x1, 3x2, or 3x3 grid while keeping it in high resolution. It then quickly lets you post the split images to Instagram to show it as one big photo on your profile. Elevate your Instagram game by giving your profile a professional look.

In PhotoSplit, you can zoom in, move, or even rotate your photo to instantly see how it will look like on your Instagram profile.

Why PhotoSplit?
‚Ä¢ Choose from variety of grid options: 3x1, 3x2, 3x3
‚Ä¢ Keeps images in high resolution. Does not reduce quality after splitting.
‚Ä¢ Ability to rotate photos
‚Ä¢ Share images to Instagram without having to save first
‚Ä¢ Option to save to your phone gallery (SD card)
‚Ä¢ **NEW**: Now send any image from your phone or while browsing directly to the PhotoSplit app.

recentChanges: - Bug fixes and performance enhancements.
comments: The quality of the cropping was decent enough BUT after the first or second save to my Camera Roll it said 'in order to be able to save anymore, I had to go Pro.' Like I said on someone else's Grid app, I'm not subscribing to this type of app. Which I'm only going to use once a year or every couple years. Especially with subpar quality. Had it saved me time saying "Limited Use without purchasing" and improved the quality of the pics instead of pixelating it I would've given a better rating.

Wouldn't recommend to anyone. Asks for money after you've tried the app twice. It does the job, but it's insane they're tryna profit off of literally splitting up photos. There are so many other apps that do the same thing, for free.

Never got to split a single picture. As soon as I tried to send it to Instagram, it tried to force me to by the pro version. Not gonna waste money on an app I cant even try out. Forget it. There are others.
Needs as many crop options as the competition. A cute interface only gets you so far. The numbering system helps too... But in the end the lack of crop options make this one a last resort for me.
I'm fine with paying for an app, but after 2 unsussesful attempts to post, I don't consider this a successful trial. I've used other grids in the past, not my first rodeo.

‚óÜ ANONYMOUS STORY VIEWER ‚óÜ

comments: Big fan of Tw and Fb apps, but this one just doesn't work. Great customization possibilities, love the full-screen and download buttons, however... Can't post photos off camera but only from storage, can't zoom or pan prepping photos for posting, can't select videos, DM notifications missing. I'm supporting for the effort and uninstalling and following the updates closely.

Aright. Anything is better than insta's UI, where over 25% of the posts are ads. This app is nice because there are no ads. Cons: no zoom. Over-sensitive UI (nearly every touch drops you into the comments section). Stories interface needs tons of work. Still better than insta.

Meh. Not great. I like the added feature (fullscreen posts, download images) but the lack of some basic functions seen in the original client (no notifications for dms, unable to post multiple pictures in one post, no translate option) is a deal breaker for me. Other notes: very slow and laggy.

I am using the Facebook client of this app on my iPad. It's really a nice app with constant support. But android version lacks in features. I am unable to upload my story on this app. There is no share button after selecting the photo or video for the story. I am a bit disappointed.

Sharing stories doesn't work. Direct messaging doesn't work. Everything loads very slowly, especially stories. Changing accounts is difficult because the account name and profile pictures don't show up and the order changes

title: Threads from Instagram
description:
üëã Hey, this is Threads ‚Äì a new app for keeping up with your close friends. It‚Äôs the place for you to quickly share photos, videos, statuses, and Stories with your Instagram Close Friends list.
 
Close Friends Only
Threads works with the people on your Close Friends list, so you‚Äôre in control of who can reach you on the app. You can create and edit your list anytime on Instagram or Threads. 
 
Share Instantly
You can share photos and videos in ‚ö°Ô∏èspeed. Use camera shortcuts to send them to your close friends in just two taps.
 
Share What You‚Äôre Up To with Status
You can choose from a selection of pre-set statuses (üìö Studying), create your own (üòÖ Procrastinating), or enable automatic status, which shares little bits of context with your friends (for example, if you‚Äôre üå≤ In the wild). You can choose whether to use status, and only your close friends will see your status.
 
Continue Using Instagram
Messages from your Close Friends will now appear in Threads, but you will still have access them on Instagram.

comments: It's a great app, and I love it so far. But on android at least it has some obvious issues that need to be fixed. For example, often times a friend will send me a photo from the in app camera, which is one of the main uses of the the app, and I will open the photo only to be able to see the bottom of the photo clipped all the way up at the top of my device, rendering the main purpose of the app kind of useless, but I do frequently use it to text, and so far that seems to be pretty solid. S9+btw

It's a very nice app. I really love it. Nice effort on the designs and all the stuff. What I really hate is the camera roll(the app starts with the camera open) and you have to add people to close friends list to chat . I need it more deeper like wanna chat like normal to everyone instead of just some close friends. And there are some bugs too. Sometimes pictures keep sending to our friends without our knowledge.

This is an app where you chat where close friends... I don't know what to tell you but it's good for chatting with close friends and stuff and you can send photos to those close friends too via the camera roll or just take a picture on the app and send it directly to them... This app is good a doing what it's supposed to do I guess... Also there is this status feature where you can show your friends what you are doing... That's cool too I guess

It should not only have the function to chat with close friends but also with people who are not in the close friend list..and it should have chat heads as in " messenger " ...fix theses things ..nd the app will be awsm

I love it very much but at the same time, I'm have some reservations. I'd have loved if I was given an option to have all my Direct Messages or just my close friends list in it. Overall, it's a great app and I'd keep using it. If you ever get to read this review, I hope you consider creating that option. I believe some people wouldn't mind choosing. Thank you very much.

title: Repost for Instagram - Regrann
description:
Regrann - Repost for Instagram lets you repost Instagram photos and videos without adding watermarks. Regrann also lets you save Instagram photos to your phone. You repost Instagram photos right from Instagram without leaving the app. To SCHEDULE posts, try the Regrann Pro app. 

100% Free 

SIMPLE - No need to leave Instagram
 
From any Instagram screen and from any Instagram user, repost Instagram photos you like, click on the 3 dots bellow the comments and select ‚ÄúCopy share URL‚Äù. It‚Äôs that easy! Regrann will activate and give you the choice to repost to your Instagram feed, keep to repost later, save or share with any other app that accepts photos or videos. You can repost photos or videos to your Instagram feed with just 2 clicks. 

Download Photos

Instantly download Instagram photos. Regrann will save Instagram pics to your picture folder with the name of the Instagram poster. 

Download Videos

 Super easy to download Instagram videos so you can play them again later. 

AUTHENTIC - Keep original Instagram pics and videos intact when you repost 

Provide your followers with the full experience of the Instagram pics you repost, share or save. Regrann gives credit to the user when you repost Instagram photos without modifying in any way the photos and videos. When you repost Instagram photos credit is added to the caption of the photos / videos you repost.

 FAST - No login required 

Regrann uses the Instagram app to repost photos and videos. So, there is no need for you to login to it. Also, Regrann can be set to operate in Quick modes to repost Instagram photos and videos, saving to your device or posting later... for even higher speed. 

NOTICE : Instagram users who set their photo/video to private will not show Copy URL link, so please do not try to download these photos. 

Options

- Choose to enable watermarks if you want to give even more credit when you repost Instagram photos and videos. 

- Add signatures automatically. When you repost Instagram photos you can have a preset signature which can either add to the Instagram caption, or replace it completely. 

Disclaimer: 
 This app is not affiliated with Instagram. Any unauthorized action or repost of photo/video and/or violations of Intellectual property rights is the sole responsibility of the user. Please do not use Regrann to save photos / download videos without the permission of the owners. Respect the rights of the Instagram users.

title: StoryLab - insta story art maker for Instagram
description:
If a story unfolds or if someone unfolds it, it is told to someone else. Let's unfold your story!

Story Lab is an instagram stories editor and a design kit that helps you create beautiful ig collage layouts for Instagram story. Unique insta story and post will be made with templates, or can be made on an empty canva and you can customize it with insta filter and overlay, text, stickers, brush. Using StoryLab, it is super easy to design amazing Instagram stories, insta posts and even ig highlight cover icons and tezza logo for Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp and Snapchat.

All you have to do is to select a color story or feed template, or just pick an empty canva of white background editing it with a little storychic to make it your own, and then choose photos or videos from your camera roll. You can edit it with filter and overlay, text, stickers and tezza features. Stretch out one finger to customize your amazing Insta chroma stories, Instagram posts, and storyboost right now! Use the easy editing tool to be a dazzle instagram editor and highlight cover icon and logo maker in IG, Facebook, WhatsApp and Snapchat!

Highlight resources:
Templates
- Over 300 customizable collage and layout templates. Try to be an insta story artist!
- 9:16 story/status & 1:1 post templates.
- Different styles of frames, including mojo, Film, Polaroid, Japanese Nichi, Wreaths etc.
- Use a color story templates to made your storyboost to be an IG story art.
- Use the post templates to mix photos or design your own insta layout and collage art.
- Support both photos and videos :D

Background
- Dozens of high-quality background image, including Landscape, Marble, Starry sky or Mojito texture.
- Choose background to create your highlight cover icons.
- Change the background color to match your photo and video.

Texts
- Type and tell your instories with over 50 awesome fonts of handwriting.
- Made texts in Instagram storyluxe and highlight cover icon more decent with tools like spacing and aligning features.
- Be an ins writer in high quality with chroma, watercolor, glitter and mouve writing texture.

Stickers
- Decorate your insta nichi stories with beautiful stickers.
- Choose from over 300 stickers, covering styles of Retro, Brush, Stamp and mojo to create unique instagram story and highlight cover!
- Photo cut out tool enables you to create custom stickers and highlight cover icon and combine them with fashion ins tezza stickers.
- Update more ins stickers of new trends and different styles constantly.

Filters
- Save a color story with over 100 stunning lightroom and VSCO presets for photos and videos.
- Natural lightleak overlay filters to add mojo to your insta story.
- More fx effects will be updated, including tezza, glitch, VHS, prequel-like retro effects.

Brushes
- Use two new brushes and over 100 textures to made the tezza Kirakira.
- More brush functions are waiting for Instagram artists and ins editors to unlock.

Download StoryLab to create story and post collage as you like. You will be surprised by how easy it is to design aesthetic insta stories and feed for your Instagram.

StoryLab - the best IG story maker for both videos and pictures.

title: Reposter for Instagram: Download & Save
description:
For years we've been working to provide you with the best experience we can create, so you can easily download, save and repost Instagram photos and videos to share with your friends or followers.

You don't need to screenshot anymore!

 HOW TO REPOST:
Install the app and open it. Once it starts ‚Äì it begins waiting for you to copy an URL of Instagram post.
1 Open Instagram and find the post you' d like to repost or download. 
2 Click the tree dots button on top of the post.
3 The menu appears. Select "copy share url". Reposter will handle the rest.

I clicked on three dots button, but there is no "copy share url" ‚Äì Ensure that the account you are trying to repost from is public.
We respect privacy ‚Äì if the account is private you can not repost from it.
I have copied the link, but nothing happens ‚Äì sometimes Reposter fells asleep. Just run the app once again.

Repost videos
We provide you with the latest high-end industry technology to work with videos, so you can regram videos you‚Äôve found with your followers.

Share everywhere
Amazing! Now you can not only regram IG videos and photos, but also send them directly to your friends via any messenger, Viber or WhatsApp, Facebook, Pinterest, or any social network you like! Don't let your friends miss a thing!

Download
Save to your phone to view the image or video while in offline. We will create Reposter album in your gallery to store your liked media

Clear watermarks
We don't use awkward dark stripes at the edges of your post like other repost ig apps - our watermark is clean and clear, so the picture remains beautiful as it is. You can use this to add copy rights to your photos.

Be safe and secure
We don't store your password or username, we don't ask for them, we don't need them, so you can be sure they won't be stolen.

Reposter has lots of features making your experience more interesting and fun:

Repost Editor
Unleash your creativity and make reposting an art. Add stickers, emojis, texts and your drawings to photos and videos to share your emotions with friends or to make a joke. Crop photos, to focus on what you really want to share.

World and Local Trends
Explore what people are talking about ‚Äì Reposter shows you the latest posts about trending topics in the world and nearby. Find one you care about and repost to share with your followers.

Top Reposts
See what others reposting most to find interesting posts and people.

Custom Chronological Feed
View latest posts of people you have reposted from in your feed, so you won't miss new interesting posts. You can create your custom feed, different from your Instagram feed ‚Äì just search for people and add them to feed manually. More than that ‚Äì you can even follow tags!

The application is not sponsored, endorsed by or affiliated with Instagram nor Facebook. Please note that materials published on Instagram may be copyrighted. You are responsible for following Instagram copyright policies.
descriptionHTML:
For years we've been working to provide you with the best experience we can create, so you can easily download, save and repost Instagram photos and videos to share with your friends or followers.

You don't need to screenshot anymore!

HOW TO REPOST:
Install the app and open it. Once it starts ‚Äì it begins waiting for you to copy an URL of Instagram post.
1 Open Instagram and find the post you' d like to repost or download.
2 Click the tree dots button on top of the post.
3 The menu appears. Select "copy share url". Reposter will handle the rest.

I clicked on three dots button, but there is no "copy share url" ‚Äì Ensure that the account you are trying to repost from is public.
We respect privacy ‚Äì if the account is private you can not repost from it.
I have copied the link, but nothing happens ‚Äì sometimes Reposter fells asleep. Just run the app once again.

Repost videos
We provide you with the latest high-end industry technology to work with videos, so you can regram videos you‚Äôve found with your followers.

Share everywhere
Amazing! Now you can not only regram IG videos and photos, but also send them directly to your friends via any messenger, Viber or WhatsApp, Facebook, Pinterest, or any social network you like! Don't let your friends miss a thing!

Download
Save to your phone to view the image or video while in offline. We will create Reposter album in your gallery to store your liked media

Clear watermarks
We don't use awkward dark stripes at the edges of your post like other repost ig apps - our watermark is clean and clear, so the picture remains beautiful as it is. You can use this to add copy rights to your photos.

Be safe and secure
We don't store your password or username, we don't ask for them, we don't need them, so you can be sure they won't be stolen.

Reposter has lots of features making your experience more interesting and fun:

Repost Editor
Unleash your creativity and make reposting an art. Add stickers, emojis, texts and your drawings to photos and videos to share your emotions with friends or to make a joke. Crop photos, to focus on what you really want to share.

World and Local Trends
Explore what people are talking about ‚Äì Reposter shows you the latest posts about trending topics in the world and nearby. Find one you care about and repost to share with your followers.

Top Reposts
See what others reposting most to find interesting posts and people.

Custom Chronological Feed
View latest posts of people you have reposted from in your feed, so you won't miss new interesting posts. You can create your custom feed, different from your Instagram feed ‚Äì just search for people and add them to feed manually. More than that ‚Äì you can even follow tags!

The application is not sponsored, endorsed by or affiliated with Instagram nor Facebook. Please note that materials published on Instagram may be copyrighted. You are responsible for following Instagram copyright policies.
summary: Repost, Share and Download from Instagram. Chosen by 10,000,000+ people!
developerAddress: Russian Federation, Saint-Petersburg, Klinskiy prospekt, 25, A, 3N
comments: Update: Never heard back from anyone regarding my issue so I cancelled my subscription and remove the app. There are better ones out there anyways. ---------------------------- I pay monthly for this app but it hasn't worked right in months. It's not opening automatically anymore and when it copies the link, it says page not found. Fix it otherwise I will cancel my membership and delete this app.

The app starts off great, no issues no bugs .... as soon as you sign up to the subscription then the issues start EVERY MONTH!!! It starts off as a simple bug, will open sometimes and sometimes it won't, followed by a week of crashing. Then finally, it won't work for about a month AT ALL!! No communication from support has always been a huge issue with this app it makes it that more worse than it should be. Beyond frustrated, definitely canceling my subscription!

Over a week since the OTA update and this still doesn't work. It's a shame because it was a great app, but we're on day 11 now where I can't use it and there's no word of when an update would come so it would work with the S9+ again.

I still have 6 months to go on my subscription and I've already cancelled. I refuse to renew for the 3rd time when there is no support or help center. It does not save all images nor does it even allow me to repost.

App was great for a few months. Now the copy function is not working to auto post. When you open the app too paste the link it doesn't load properly. I emailed devs for support before I left a negative rating. Now I have an annual membership that I got 3/12 months for

comments: This is just amazing, crazy how easy it's to use this amazing app! I'm so happy I was able to find this app, it has a freaking built-in hashtag generator!!! What else would you need ??? You can even schedule your first comment! IT EVEN TELLS YOU WHEN'S THE RIGHT TIME TO POSTüò± I'm so freaking happy these people have created this wonderful app don't even think about it! DOWNLOAD IT NOW, and there are not that many adverts! It's a beautiful creation I feel like it changed my whole life, so great!!

Its amazing in every form and allows you to skip unnecessary steps like repeating the same hashtags and locations and adds a nice strategic sense to posting. I recommend testing first to see if you like it because i currently pay the $19 plan which gives nice flexibility.

Even when I want to schedule posts for next month, it's telling me I used 10/10 free auto posts this month already - it's not even for this month! Great idea but the pro plan is too expensive. We should get more than 10 auto posts per month and the hashtag research should be free too.

The best scheduling app I've encountered. Most cost efficient. Works with personal and private accounts. Needs a little bit of UX/UI improvement but I'm happy to say that their dev team is open to suggestions and quick to respond.

I seriously love this app! I would recommend it to anyone whether you just have a personal account or a business one. The only thing I wish it had is the ability to schedule posts on LinkedIn. I hope they add that someday!!!

title: Boomerang from Instagram
description:
Boomerang from Instagram makes everyday moments fun and unexpected. Create captivating mini videos that loop back and forth, then share them with your friends.

Find something (or someone!) that's moving, or create a video selfie by switching to the front-facing camera. There‚Äôs just one button. Tap it once and Boomerang does the rest: shoots a burst of 10 photos and turns them into a delightful mini video. Share it on Facebook and Instagram right from the app, or save your video to your camera roll to share later. 

FEATURES

* Take mini videos of your life and yourself using the front and back facing camera. 
* Download and start capturing immediately. No sign up or account required.
* There's just one button! The app takes 10 photos and stitches them together, speeds up the video and then loops it back and forth.
* Share your videos on Instagram and Facebook right from the app, or share them later from your camera roll.

comments: The quality of the pictures is definitely good enough for instagram. It's very easy to crop a picture in two with a 4:5 aspect ratio. One thing I would like is the ability to add a small white border to the picture with the "no crop" feature, but I can do that step with another app and finish it with this one. Edit: so the white border option was implemented and worked fine for a while but now it's bugged and I can only pick between 100% or 60%

The main problem I have with this app is the white line that appears between the images. On the plus side, it does allow you to put up images in the 4:5 ratio and it is free (the other top rated app only seems to do Square and then charges after you've used it twice). But the line is too big an issue for me, so I uninstalled it and went with another app.
Nice app... Helps me to cut pic and post side that I want it... But it still needs adjustment... But overall, it helps me soooo much!!! Keep up the good work!!!

Also, I'd like to see more quick ratio buttons in the ratio adjustment section of the no crop function. For example, you have a 1:1 button, but there should be a button for each native Instagram ratio (1:1, 4:3, 4:5, 1:1.91).
Best free app for panorama split! There was a other one that only allowed 2 free splits and that one was deleted promptly. So happy I found this app here!!

comments: It definitely does what it's supposed to but I've noticed a couple things. If you try to string together more than 25-30 seconds of footage from different clips, sometimes Inshot freezes & locks up. It may have to do with my phone's memory & processing power also but as this does not occur all the time, I suspect it's the app. Also, when I add text to a video it sometimes doesn't look good after saving it...the text looks jagged, as if it's a low-quality JPEG file. This should be looked into.

This is a pretty decent video editor. The only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars is because I can only add an edit on the whole video and not part of it. For example I can't have the video sped up on just one part I can only make it sped up on the whole video. Same thing for zooming in on a certain part of the screen. Can't animate anything either.

I recommend this app to EVERYONE!!! Literally you can resize for your instagram stories so they don't get cut off. You can resize for a post so IT doesn't get cut off either. You can add music, you can do it all with this app. I even paid to get the watermark removed, SO WORTH IT! My only qualm is that I wish you could speed things up 10x. That's my only wish for this app!

I started using this app on my Apple device and I liked it so much that I bought two licenses for different devices. However, when I switched to OnePlus, I realised that InShot doesn't have the same transitions for Android. I was disappointed to see that there are actually no video transitions - even for pro members. It has only video effects. The whole purpose of me buying the app was the transitions because I could actually edit a proper professional looking video on my phone.

It has more features than most free video editing apps, but it it also good for shorter videos as well as long ones. You can quickly make a few small adjustments to video clips and then you can make an entire vlog if you wanted to. Overall this app is my favorite one to edit my videos for school and daily life.

title: Follower Analyzer for Instagram
description:
Found some interesting profile on Instagram? Need to know who always liked and commented on their post and etc? This is the app for you. With this app you, not only you can get more insight about your profile, it also can unlock many secret of your friends. Leave no stone unturned. Get it now!


‚òÖ FEATURE
‚Ä¢View who unfollowed you on Instagram and who is not following you back, track new followers, view fans and more
‚Ä¢View follower/followers who NEVER or ALWAYS liked your posts
‚Ä¢View follower/followers who NEVER or ALWAYS commented on your posts
‚Ä¢View your top liked and top commented posts
‚Ä¢View your top watched video

‚Ä¢You can also analyze any of your friend account or any account that you follow to see their stats such as most liked post, top liker, top commenter, most profile tagged in their post and many more. Get it now to reveal your friend secrets

comments: The "likes analyzer" was crashing due to having over 1400 photos in my gallery. The app admin responded that the IG server is now more restricted. "By using this feature, our app will make many requests at once to Instagram server to fetch the "likes" data for each post. If you have many posts, more requests will be created." Therefore, I archived down to 250 photos. The analyzer now works fine. Per the app admin, "currently we are working on how to circumvent the restriction." Thank you. üëç

Started off as a pretty great app. It let me check my followers, likes on each post, people who unfollowed as well as a list of all the people who like my posts (from highest likes to lowest) as well as analyzing other profiles to see their followers and people who liked and commented on their posts. It was perfect. Until it wasn't. App started malfunctioning. Showed that all of my followers unfollowed me (wasn't the case), wouldn't unfollow when I clicked the unfollow button, etc. Disappointed.

Change from 5 stars to 1 star. What happened with top analyze likers? It always crashed and forced closed everytime i wanna use that feature. I bought that add-on feature (add-on in app purchase) long time ago, and it used to be okay n very functional, but now seems to crash all the time. While top likers analyze is the feature that i use the most in this app

Update 02/02/20: The Like Analyzer has completely stopped working. The app crashes whenever you try to use it. Downgraded from 5 to 3 stars. Original- I've used several follower apps in the past and found this one to be, by far, the best. You do have to pay for some of the more useful features such as "like analyer" but the cost is very much worth it. I love the ability to select which photos I'd like to have analyzed instead of having to analyze my entire stream. Highly recommend this app.

The app works well for what I want, simply to manage my followers better. However I have found that the unfollow option doesnt work most of the time and I'm having to go to the persons account and unfollow the old fashioned way. Only a slight inconvenience, but not the end of the world.

title: Insights for Instagram ‚úîFollowers ‚úîGhosts ‚úîStories
description:
Easily manage your relationships with Insights, a tiny non-intrusive application with an ability to view your relationships by category:
‚ñ∫ Mutual Followers: Those who you follow and those that follow you back.
‚ñ∫ Fans: Followers that you do not follow back.
‚ñ∫ Unrequited Followers: Those that you follow but don't follow you.
‚ñ∫ Ghost Followers: Accounts which have not liked your last few posts.
‚ñ∫ Recent Unfollowers: Get notifications for accounts that have unfollowed you recently.

But wait! There's more:
‚ñ∫ Post & Stories download: Quickly download user stories and re-share them on your profile.
‚ñ∫ Re-post: Easily share an image to your profile from another.
‚ñ∫ Spam profile detection: Use the power of Machine Learning to detect if an account is authentic or a spam profile.
‚ñ∫ Tag performance: Check which hashtags are giving you the most engagement and likes.
‚ñ∫ Trends: Track the growth of your profile over time, identify milestones and figure out content works best for your profile.
‚ñ∫ Hashtag suggestions: Insights applies a tailored algorithm to determine what hashtags are most effective for your content. Automatically suggesting new tags to increase engagement and get you more likes and followers.

Note that Insights is a read-only app, it does not modify or update your profile in any way. If you're looking for a trustworthy and reliable swiss army tool for your profile, look no further!

I love it! So helpful, straightfoward easy to understand and use, and extra features are awesome too, honestly im in love now cant want any other, i hope more interesting features would be added because ill keep updating!

title: Regrann Pro - Repost for Instagram
description:
Regrann Pro is the paid professional version of the free Regrann, the #1 reposting app.

This is NOT a free app.  It is a paid monthly subscription but you will have a 7 day trial so you can test all of the features.  We also offer a no questions asked 100% money back guarantee.  Just email at any time if you want a refund. 

Please make sure to uninstall Regrann Free before using this app.

Schedule for Professionals
Pre-schedule your entire campaign and let Regrann Pro do the posting at the dates and times you want. Automatically.

You found a great photo to repost, but you already posted your daily photo? No problem, just schedule it for any other day and time. Regrann Pro will automatically post it for you.

Regrann - Repost for Instagram lets you repost Instagram photos and videos without adding watermarks. Regrann also lets you save Instagram photos to your phone. You repost Instagram photos right from Instagram without leaving the app.

No Ads

Direct Post
Are you tired of pasting the caption? Use Direct Post, to add the caption automatically to your post.

Clean Caption
No @Regrann and #regrann added to the caption.

Share, Save or Repost Vine videos
On any Vine video just click the 3 dots and select 'Copy Link'.  Regrann will then pop up and let you do whatever you want with that Vine video.
  
Don't want to go through all the Instagram upload screens, use Direct Post and remove 4 clicks from the repost process.

SIMPLE - No need to leave Instagram
From any Instagram screen and from any Instagram user, repost Instagram photos you like, click on the 3 dots bellow the comments and select ‚ÄúCopy share URL‚Äù. It‚Äôs that easy! 

Regrann will activate and give you the choice to repost to your Instagram feed, keep to repost later, save or share with any other app that accepts photos or videos. 

You can repost photos or videos to your Instagram feed with just 2 clicks.

Download Photos
Instantly download Instagram photos.  Regrann will save Instagram pics to your picture folder with the name of the Instagram poster.

Download Videos
Super easy to download Instagram or Vine videos so you can play them again later.

Save from Vine
Just click on Copy URL on a Vine and you Regrann will let you save it or post it Instagram.

AUTHENTIC - Keep original Instagram pics and videos intact when you repost
Provide your followers with the full experience of the Instagram pics you repost, share or save.  Regrann gives credit to the user when you repost Instagram photos without modifying in any way the photos and videos. 

When you repost Instagram photos credit is added to the caption of the photos / videos you repost. 

FAST - No login required
Regrann uses the Instagram app to repost photos and videos. So, there is no need for you to login to it.  

Also, Regrann can be set to operate in Quick modes to repost Instagram photos and videos, saving to your device or posting later... for even higher speed.

NOTICE :  Instagram users who set their photo/video to private will not show Copy URL link, so please do not try to download these photos.
 

Options
- Choose to enable watermarks if you want to give even more credit when you repost Instagram photos and videos.

descriptionHTML:
Regrann Pro is the paid professional version of the free Regrann, the #1 reposting app.

This is NOT a free app. It is a paid monthly subscription but you will have a 7 day trial so you can test all of the features. We also offer a no questions asked 100% money back guarantee. Just email at any time if you want a refund.

Please make sure to uninstall Regrann Free before using this app.

Schedule for Professionals
Pre-schedule your entire campaign and let Regrann Pro do the posting at the dates and times you want. Automatically.

You found a great photo to repost, but you already posted your daily photo? No problem, just schedule it for any other day and time. Regrann Pro will automatically post it for you.

Regrann - Repost for Instagram lets you repost Instagram photos and videos without adding watermarks. Regrann also lets you save Instagram photos to your phone. You repost Instagram photos right from Instagram without leaving the app.

No Ads

Direct Post
Are you tired of pasting the caption? Use Direct Post, to add the caption automatically to your post.

Clean Caption
No @Regrann and #regrann added to the caption.

Share, Save or Repost Vine videos
On any Vine video just click the 3 dots and select 'Copy Link'. Regrann will then pop up and let you do whatever you want with that Vine video.

Don't want to go through all the Instagram upload screens, use Direct Post and remove 4 clicks from the repost process.

SIMPLE - No need to leave Instagram
From any Instagram screen and from any Instagram user, repost Instagram photos you like, click on the 3 dots bellow the comments and select ‚ÄúCopy share URL‚Äù. It‚Äôs that easy!

Regrann will activate and give you the choice to repost to your Instagram feed, keep to repost later, save or share with any other app that accepts photos or videos.

You can repost photos or videos to your Instagram feed with just 2 clicks.

Download Photos
Instantly download Instagram photos. Regrann will save Instagram pics to your picture folder with the name of the Instagram poster.

Download Videos
Super easy to download Instagram or Vine videos so you can play them again later.

Save from Vine
Just click on Copy URL on a Vine and you Regrann will let you save it or post it Instagram.

AUTHENTIC - Keep original Instagram pics and videos intact when you repost
Provide your followers with the full experience of the Instagram pics you repost, share or save. Regrann gives credit to the user when you repost Instagram photos without modifying in any way the photos and videos.

When you repost Instagram photos credit is added to the caption of the photos / videos you repost.

FAST - No login required
Regrann uses the Instagram app to repost photos and videos. So, there is no need for you to login to it.

Also, Regrann can be set to operate in Quick modes to repost Instagram photos and videos, saving to your device or posting later... for even higher speed.

NOTICE : Instagram users who set their photo/video to private will not show Copy URL link, so please do not try to download these photos.


Options
- Choose to enable watermarks if you want to give even more credit when you repost Instagram photos and videos.

- Add signatures automatically. When you repost Instagram photos you can have a preset signature which can either add to the Instagram caption, or replace it completely.


Disclaimer:


  • This app is not affiliated with Instagram.

  • Any unauthorized action or repost of photo/video and/or violations of Intellectual property rights is the sole responsibility of the user.

  • Please do not use Regrann to save photos / download videos without the permission of the owners. Respect the rights of the Instagram users.

comments: Stops working randomly. it does this every few weeks or months, then i have to uninstall, and reinstall, and get charged full month again. once developers fix this issue, I'll give 5 stars. UPDATE 26/11/2019: App keeps crashing. Not reliable. So many posts scheduled all lost! Uninstalled and reinstalled. Now saying monthly charge is 7.99 instead of 1.99!!! That's ridiculous. Doesn't accept my Instagram login information, but I verified and checked several times and it is the correct login info.

Well, it stopped working for me after an update and customer service is not helpful in the slightest. Somehow a great app that I happily paid for became useless overnight. I've already cancelled my subscription because of it.

Terrible app...I would NOT reccomend this to anyone. Gave this app too many chances, got the pro version because they basicallymade it mandatory. Its literally a pain to use, it always crashes, it doesnt pop out when it should, its unreliable. Just not worth paying for. A complete waste of money.

Where is there support desk? Freshdesk does nothing and there no way to reach the publishers of thos app. Periodically I have to reinstall because it stops offering regrann option. This happen again. I paid for pro months ago. Not only does it not accept me as paid it wont recognize my log in info. Enough already. Moving to another app that has customer service. Too bad since Tegrann is great WHEN IT WORKS

like many, have been using this for a few years and now have cancelled my subscription. No longer posts to IG and issues logging in as well. Support email does not work, this needs to be removed from Google Play.

With this tool you will no longer have to worry about tediously recording and uploading over and over again to create the videos you want.

developerAddress: 1288 Ritson Rd N Oshawa, Ontario L1G 8B2
recentChanges: Minor bug fixes.
comments: Overall really good up but could I please ask to make changes in the app? When I upload the video and it is split into stories it all works great but when I share the video segments to insta stories the video keeps playing in the app while I edit the story on insta meaning that both videos are playing simultaneously. Could you please make it so that when I click share to insta the video within the app stops playback? Thanks in advance.
Cuts the video up to way too short segments

Wouldn't process video, choosing a video from gallery had no response, finally, when it did start processing the popup to process repeatedly appeared even when processing, finally had popup saying error in processing. Tried recording video, processing and uploading...first two bits were ok, but every attempt to upload failed. So, I'm uninstalling and looking for an alternative.

Upgraded to get 15sec videos. The app cuts them into irregular chunks of 14 and 16 second pieces. So when I upload, Instagram cuts them again (because 16 sec) is to long. Don't upgrade this app, it's a waste of money and I want my money back.

Okay app. I upgraded to premium however app is buggy. Often it won't let me cut my video when I select one. Have to close and reopen, really mess with it to be able to cut the videos. Other times it works fine with no issues.

title: Save & Repost for Instagram
description:

3. Back to Quick Save, download photo/video you love or swipe to dismiss, repost or share to Insta social if you want
***NOTICE: With Android 10(Q) and above, please use "Share To" and choose QuickSave or Paste URL Link into URL Box in QuickSave then Hit Download button.

***NOTICE: IG users who set their photo/video to private don't allow you to download their photo, so please do not try to save / download these photos
**********************************************

Easiest and fastest way to save beautiful, meaningful photo and video from Instagram social then repost them if you like. We also support download multiple photos in a post from Instagram social network and IGTV stories.

Disclaimer:
1. This app is not affiliated with Instagram.
2. Please report by email us at contact@instasave.me any issues before giving a bad rating.
3. Any unauthorized action or repost of album/photo/video and/or violations of Intellectual property rights is the sole responsibility of the user.
4. Please do not use Quick Save to save photos / download videos without the permission of the owners. Respect the rights of the Instagram users.
summary: Save, download, repost photo and video from Instagram with easiest, fastest way

+ Fix issue with multiple photos download
+ Android 10 support

title: Insta Tools - An Integrated Instagram Toolkit
description:
Be an Instagram Pro and influence the world with the power of Insta Tools. An Integrated toolbox giving you the functionality of not just saving your favourite content to your device, but giving you recommendations according to your post to level up your game.

"Insta Tools - Instagram Content Downloader" helps you to save Instagram photos, videos, profile picture (any public or private account), stories, highlights, captions, comments and many more such things in just a single click free and forever. 

With the updated and clean design, you can easily save all the content of your favourite Instagram accounts and can share it with your friends and family. You can also get recommendations of the post you want to upload and many more such things are coming your way.

Main Features :
- Save HD Profile Picture (Public as well Private accounts)
- Save Multiple photos, videos, stories and highlights
- No Login Required
- Download content in just 2 clicks
- Get recommended hashtags of photos (Machine Learning used behind the scenes)
- Extract text from any image
- High Definition Content promised.
- View saved images and videos in your Photos/Gallery App. No need of third party app.
- Amazing photo views with Slideshows and more.
- Clean and Updated UI
- Share photos and videos from Insta Tools App.
- Batch Save photos and videos in your phone offline.
- Share your content to external apps such as Whatsapp, Facebook, Twitter etc.

Steps to use:
 - Open Instagram and click on three dots of your favourite post located on the upper right corner of the post.
- Click on ‚ÄúCopy Link‚Äù and Open Insta Tools App and paste the link in the textbox and click Get Content
- Photos or videos will start downloading automatically, progress shown in notification.
- If you just want to share the content with your friends, you can do that by selecting the Share button and share it on WhatsApp, Facebook, Twitter etc.

title: Followers & Unfollowers
description:
Followers & Unfollowers lets you see insights on your instagram profile. You can easily unfollow 50 people who don‚Äôt follow you back. You can even white list (starred) people so that they don‚Äôt get unfollowed. It also gives you insight on people who are mutual followers, people whom you are not following and even the recent unfollowers of your instagram profile. With multiple account login you can easily switch between different instagram accounts. 

KEY FEATURES:

‚òÖ Don‚Äôt Follow Me Back - People who don't follow you back on Instagram.
‚òÖ Mutual - Mutual followers, people you follow and they follow you back.
‚òÖ Follow Back - People you are not following on instagram.
‚òÖ I follow - All people you are following on instagram
‚òÖ Recent Unfollowers - People who unfollowed you recently.
‚òÖ Starred - Long press on any person from the list of people you follow to add them to your favourite list
‚òÖ Mass unfollow - Unfollow upto 50 people with a single action.

title: Hootsuite: Schedule Posts for Twitter & Instagram
description:
Manage and schedule posts to multiple social media profiles on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Instagram and more, all from one app ‚Äì Hootsuite!

Hootsuite is free for up to 3 social network accounts and has over 15 million users. It is the top app for Android to help you manage your business on social media.

Hootsuite allows you to:
* Publish and share photos to all your social networks at once
* Manage multiple social network accounts on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, and LinkedIn
* Schedule a post to Facebook or a tweet to Twitter to be sent at a later time or day
* AutoSchedule messages to automatically post them at the best time of day
* Monitor your brand on Twitter and Facebook
* Receive optional notifications when people mention your brand or talk about keywords you follow
* Shorten links with Ow.ly and track click-through stat report analytics

Hootsuite for Android complements your account on the Hootsuite web platform. You can easily add your social network accounts such as Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn and Instagram to your Hootsuite account to get started.

Simple, efficient, and powerful, Hootsuite for Android allows you to:
* Tweet from multiple Twitter accounts or schedule tweets for Twitter accounts.
* Post to Facebook Profiles and Pages or schedule Facebook posts. 

Get the top app to build your audience, manage Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn from anywhere and tie analytics back to your goals.

Sign up for Hootsuite for free: http://hootsuite.com

If you experience any issues or want to give us feedback, tweet to us @Hootsuite_Help. We're happy to help!

Questions or feedback?
http://feedback.hootsuite.com/forums/40828-hootsuite-for-android

Twitter: @hootsuite
Facebook: http://facebook.com/hootsuite

comments: Love it! Used the free version for years & it was plenty to run our small church's social media. But now that I run multiple accounts, I upgraded to the paid version & it has been WORTH it. It saves me soooo much time!
It's the best on a PC or laptop. It's not the friendliest on tablets or phones. I have found some workarounds which is a little annoying so my rating is a little generous. I'm hoping for fixes.

So far I'm not happy with the app, in the beginning it was working fine, but after a week or 2 the scheduler did not work. Whenever I wanted to post smth on IG it would get stuck on 'open in instagram' which is very annoying to say it lightly.
Excellent on mobile, sluggish in desktop. Layout can be a little bit confusing but you get used to it.

As a post scheduler it works well. I wish it had some of the other functions that you get when going through a desktop browser. Being able to look at at your analytics and data from a mobile app would be useful. I think many social media professionals and business users would want to be able to look at the analytics numbers while on the move.

comments: I've heard later is the best but what a clunky app. Completely non-intuitive. Also, what an ugly interface, it's like looking at desktop formatted websites on a mobile browser. Use some of the money you make from subscribers to hire someone to redesign your app. Don't bother responding to my review with your generic copy paste "we care, email us" - that's just one more reason why I won't use this app.

Signed up for the plan, scheduled posts on desktop, then went to change a post on the app. App fails to connect, asks me to log in, then fails again. The only time I can get it to work is if I uninstall, then reinstall seemingly daily. Which is kind of important since in a pinch I can't access it even in a mobile browser. Posting a review just to alert to a bug- "Later" itself is brilliant, I was on the fence with Planoly and I like this much better.

Ok app,but doesn't make sense to download as an auto poster if you can't do it from mobile. Most creators are using mobiles to upload,especially because social media apps are on our mobiles..lol. It's basically still just a normal push notification app. On top of that,charges the same price as other apps that let you post from mobile & desktop.

I can't really user the app cause of difficult onboarding. I don't even start. You need to fill dumb forms which isn't adaptive and looks horrible on smartphone screen. Never seen that kind of "solution" before.
After an update I can no longer sign in with instagram.... great. Since I can't remember the password for this app or my gmail account, I'm afraid I will have to give it 3 stars.

title: Panorama for Instagram: InSwipe
description:
InSwipe allows you crop, resize, zoom, and split a full size pic to create seamless, swipeable panorama post for Instagram's multiple photo feature. No more "no crop" or "full pic" needed!

Ever wanted to display your gorgeous full size panorama photos on Instagram but had to sacrifice the resolution to fit the size restrictions? Tried cropping panoramic photos on your own but ended up with jagged, misaligned images? InSwipe solves those problems!

With InSwipe, you can now post your full panorama photo on Instagram without having to compromise the true beauty and resolution of your pic. 

This #1 most feature rich Instagram panorama app creator allows you to crop and divide your photos into equal 1x1, 2x1, 3x1, 4x1, 5x1, 6x1, 7x1, 8x1, 9x1, or 10x1 grids to create beautiful and seamless looking landscape oriented panoramic images. Inspire and gain Instagram followers by creating immersive and interactive, swipeable panoramic post. Perfect for any user looking to display the true beauty of their panoramic, landscape oriented photos straight to Instagram. You no longer need to crop your photo to a very small square or use no crop and add white borders just to fit your image! Download the best panorama app for Instagram panoramas today!

**MAIN FEATURES**
‚Ä¢ Crop and divide an image up to 10 square grids
‚Ä¢ Rotate, zoom, and resize an image while you are cropping 
‚Ä¢ Share a pic from the gallery, the browser, or anywhere else, right to the cropping app!
‚Ä¢ Swipleable panorama preview
‚Ä¢ Supports low and high resolution pics
‚Ä¢ Grid pics retain their true lossless resolution
‚Ä¢ Open Instagram directly from the app for easy upload
‚Ä¢ Quickly save your cropped grid images to your phone
‚Ä¢ Use your full photo with no need to crop or add borders
‚Ä¢ Extremely simple and easy to use, minimal material design
‚Ä¢ Dynamic layout supports multiple screen sizes including tablets
‚Ä¢ Adaptive grid lines while cropping provide a sneak peek on how your panoramic image will be split up

comments: There is a draw back that it cant take the whole pic probaly that my pic is 2 big but if you dont really care about cropping the pic use it but. You(company/dev team) just make the quilty better cause thats the main problem for me.

Used to work very well. Now all of a sudden it is saving files as .null so they don't show up in photos. Have to go in and manually rename them as .jpg.

Would be much, much better if you could change the aspect ratio of the pictures to anything other than a square 1:1 ratio. It also appears to seriously degrade the quality of high resolution pictures, as the exported frames don't look nearly as sharp as the original image when zoomed in to the same size. there's no need to reduce the resolution of the image before uploading to instagram, as instagram will automatically degrade high resolution images for you after uploading. Fix and i'll re-rate.
